services.title: HTML & CSS
services.description: At the core of my web development expertise lies mastery in HTML and CSS. With precision in these languages, I design and structure web pages, ensuring not only visual appeal but also a seamless and intuitive user experience.

services.title: Vanilla JavaScript
services.description: I possess expertise in Vanilla JavaScript, utilizing the language in its pure form to develop dynamic and interactive web applications. With a focus on clean and efficient code, I ensure a robust and seamless user experience across various platforms.

services.title: Sass, Bootstrap, & Tailwind
services.description: Mastering Sass, Bootstrap, and Tailwind, I sculpt stylish and responsive frontend designs. These tools streamline CSS, providing a solid foundation for creating visually appealing and functional user interfaces.

services.title: React, Vue & Angular
services.description: I excel in frontend development, leveraging the power of popular frameworks like React, Vue, and Angular. With expertise in these technologies, I bring dynamic and interactive user interfaces to life, ensuring a seamless and engaging user experience.

services.title: React Native
services.description: I specialize in mobile app development, harnessing the power of React Native. With this framework, I create cross-platform applications that seamlessly run on both iOS and Android, ensuring a consistent and efficient user experience across devices.

services.title: Node, Express & Nest
services.description: Specializing in backend development, I leverage Node.js, Express, and Nest frameworks to create efficient, scalable systems tailored to diverse project requirements with precision and expertise.

services.title: MySQL, MongoDB & Firebase
services.description: I specialize in database management, adeptly working with MySQL, MongoDB, and Firebase. Leveraging these technologies, I ensure efficient and secure data storage, retrieval, and management, tailored to the specific needs of each project.

services.title: PHP & Laravel
services.description: My expertise lies in PHP and Laravel, where I specialize in creating robust and scalable web applications. With a focus on efficient server-side scripting and Laravel's powerful framework, I ensure the development of high-quality, tailored solutions for diverse project needs.

services.title: WordPress
services.description: I specialize in developing custom WordPress themes and plugins, tailoring solutions to meet specific project requirements. With a focus on design and functionality, I ensure seamless integration and a personalized user experience for each WordPress project.

projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: Experience weather at your fingertips with our React-based Weather App oowered by the OpenWeatherMap API.

projects.title: GitHub API
projects.description: A React project using GitHub API and GraphQL enables users to search and display GitHub repositories.

projects.title: Task Manager
projects.description: This Todo List app, designed for self-organization, is built using React, and incorporates JWT for authentication and authorization.

projects.title: QR Code Generator
projects.description: Effortlessly create personalized QR codes with this streamlined JavaScript tool. Input your text, hit generate, and get your QR code instantly.
